name: The Sacrifice (Spooktober Jam 2021)
description:
This game uses the same assets that my game Horroria uses. In fact, Horroria was used as placeholder. The game was done in 1 day for the jam, on 25th October 2021, but the assets were reused.

Dev log

I have changed the main title artwork. I have also added a fireplace instead beds in the right side of the room. Nothing else is changed. If you want the new version you can download it again, but the new version offers no gameplay differences than old version.

PS: I spent like 30m trying to center the pictures and for some weird reason, it won't happen, so I just desist... 

   
Credits

Special mention to Com_sho, SchwarzeNacht, Sithjester, Kadokawa, and Cocoparisienne

Sound effects are from freesoundeffects.com

Thanks to Blizzard for the Combat System, and SephirothSpawn for the Lantern Script

Music by Anamura

Game developed by Anamura
